Room.Name: Evenborough Way/Nissiau Lane Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Nissiau Lane and Evenborough Way.
Room.LongDescription: Nissiau Lane runs west from here, through a number of small shops on both sides of the road. The northwestern section of town is known for its great selection of shops and facilities, and Nissiau Lane runs between most of them. Evenborough Way continues to the north and south from here.
